palette.title: f r i e n d s h i p.
palette.description: July 20th is in Argentina (and probably in many other countries) "Friendship Day", I am not much into these kind of days usually, but I always make an exception for this day, cause it's not about presents... it's simply about reminding our friends how much we love them, we care about them even if they are busy, away or whatever. Friendship day is every single day of the year, but today I just want to tell you... you rock!! :) <3!! tirzah
